articles.author: Dennis Wagner, USA TODAY
articles.title: The COVID culture war: At what point should personal freedom yield to the common good? - USA TODAY
articles.description: America's debate over pandemic mask and vaccine mandates hinges on an age-old dilemma: When does personal liberty yield to the public interest?
articles.content:
In Anaheim, Disneyland worker Judy Hart, 62, says she’ll never get the COVID-19 vaccine because it’s “experimental.” 
What about masks? Hart wears one while working retail sales at the most magical … [+13628 chars]

articles.title: COVID Breakthrough: About 99.999% of fully vaccinated Americans have not had a deadly breakthrough case, CDC data shows - WTVD-TV
articles.description: More than 99.9% of people fully vaccinated against COVID have not had a breakthrough case resulting in hospitalization or death, according to the CDC.
articles.content: More than 99.99% of people fully vaccinated against Covid-19 have not had a breakthrough case resulting in hospitalization or death, according to the latest data from the US Centers for Disease Contr… [+4262 chars]

articles.title: Meggitt agrees £6.3bn takeover by Parker Hannifin - Financial Times
articles.description: Company’s shares surge to record high after latest move from an American buyer targeting a British group
articles.content:
UK aerospace and defence company Meggitt is to be taken over by US rival Parker Hannifin in a £7.1bn deal that marks the latest approach for a UK listed company by an overseas buyer.

articles.title: 'Jungle Cruise' sails atop box office despite COVID concerns - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Despite growing concerns over the delta variant, “Jungle Cruise” still drew moviegoers out to theaters during the film's opening weekend to sail atop the North American box office.
articles.content:
